title: Ketu Transit in the 10th House for Cancer Ascendant
summary: Ketu transiting your tenth house brings detachment from status, recognition, and conventional definitions of success. Career motivation may feel muted, especially toward authority-driven roles or public validation. You may prefer working quietly without seeking acknowledgment. This phase questions ambition rooted in image and pushes you to redefine purpose beyond titles. When handled consciously, Ketu here supports integrity-driven work, reduces ego in leadership, and aligns professional life with inner values.

sections.heading: Career
points: Preference for low-visibility or backend roles.
Work aligns better with meaning than rank.

sections.heading: Relationships
points: Reduced need for approval from seniors.
Respect comes through competence, not display.

sections.heading: Finance
points: Stability improves through clarity of role.

closing: Ketu in the 10th house strips ambition of ego. What remains is work aligned with inner truth, not outer applause.
